BCR Profile

We use multiple liquidity providers from Tier 1 Banks and institutions to give you competitive quotes on a wide range of instruments.

  • BCR PROFILE
  • WHY BCR
  • CONTACT US
  • DISCLOSURE DOCUMENTS

About BCR

BCR is a world-leading online trading provider, striving to provide our clients with transparent and reliable execution coupled with attentive client service. We offer derivatives on 5 asset classes: Forex, Metals, Commodities, Indices, and Shares. We provide our clients with access to top-tier liquidity and advanced trade execution with no dealing desk intervention.

Vision

BCR provides investors with the means to cross the divide and reach their financial objectives. Our financial services are a vital tool for either the sophisticated investor or whoever new to here. Bridge the difference – the choice is yours.

Values

When it comes to offering an extensive selection of goal-oriented, investor-centric services, BCR prides itself on delivering what the client needs. We value the trust that our investors place in us and reward it with a commitment to meet criteria of high reliability and transparency.

Top-Tier Liquidity Providers

Regulation

BCR has over 20 years of commitment to the financial industry. As a regulated investment firm, your funds are deposited into a Tier-1 banking institution. Your account is fully secured when you trade with BCR.

BCR Co Pty Ltd (BCR Global) is authorised and regulated by Australian Security and Investment Commission (certificate no. SIBA/L/19/1122).

BCR Co Pty Ltd (BCR Global) is authorised and regulated by Australian Security and Investment Commission (certificate no. SIBA/L/19/1122).

Our Partners

INTRODUCING BROKER

EARN ONGOING COMMISSIONS

The BCR Introducing Brokers Program is designed to offer you best-of-market rebates whilst maximizing your growth potential and profitability sustainably.

BCR is willing to not only reward our partners, but also partners’ clients. Our generous promotions and cutting-edge tool kit will consistently help you to attract and maintain your client base.

  • Assigned personal business development manager
  • A competitive IB rebate structure
  • Instant rebate injection to you IB MT4 Account
  • Advanced Statistical system in MyBCR to track your business performance
  • Free marketing package

CPA AFFILIATE

REFER NEW CLIENTS AND EARN

BCR also provides CPA Affiliate Program for those who are more interested in a flat fee for every client brought in.
